fusion: FUSION is one of the six damage types in the game. Can be related to Fire
glacio: GLACIO is one of the six damage types in the game. Can be related to Ice
aero: AERO is one of the six damage types in the game. Can be related to Wind
electro: ELECTRO is one of the six damage types in the game.
spectro: SPECTRO is one of the six damage types in the game.
havoc: HAVOC is one of the six damage types in the game.
rectifier: Rectifier is one of the 5 type of Weapons in game, common in "non-phisical" characters.
sword: Sword is one of the 5 type of Weapons in game, common in "phisical" characters.
broadblade: Broadblade is one of the 5 type of Weapons in game, common in "phisical" characters.
gauntlets: Gauntlet is one of the 5 type of Weapons in game, common in "phisical" characters.
pistols: Pistols is one of the 5 type of Weapons in game, common in "long-raged" characters.

modes.full: Current mode: Show all damage detailed

characters.aalto: Aalto is a character with AERO elemental bonus, Aalto's main characteristis are his Concerto Efficiency and AERO DMG Amplification in 23% to other characters, with their ability Outro: Dissolving Mist.
characters.baizhi: Baihzi is a character with GLACIO elemental bonus, but her main role is Healing and support the team with her skills, as well buff with DMG Amplification in 15% with Outro: Rejuvinating Flow. Baihzi skills are affected by maximum HP value
characters.calcharo: Calcharo is a character with ELECTRO elemental bonus, Calcharo's main role is Main Damage Dealer with Basic and Resonance Liberation Damage, since liberation swaps his basic attacks and uses the basic/heavy bonuses.
characters.changli: Changli is a character with FUSION elemental bonus, Changli's main characteristis are her FUSION DMG Amplification in 20% and Liberation DMG Amplification in 25% to other characters, with their ability Outro: Strategy of Duality. Also can be a Main DPS with focus on Ressonance Skill and Liberation DMG
characters.chixia: Chixia is a character with FUSION elemental bonus, Chixia's main role are Main DPS with focus on Forte Circuit DAKA DAKA and Boom Boom.
characters.danjin: Danjin is a character with HAVOC elemental bonus, Danjin's main role is Deal Damage in her rotation and increase HAVOC DMG in 23% with her Outro: Duality.
characters.encore: Encore is a character with FUSION elemental bonus, Encore's main role are Main DPS with focus on Basic Attacks, once her Liberation uses Basic Damage Bonus.
characters.jianxin: Jianxin is a character with AERO elemental bonus, Jianxin main focus is the Liberation DMG Amplification in 38% with Outro: Transcendence, she also generate Shields and also deals damage in Heavy Attacks.
characters.jinhsi: Jinhsi is a character with SPECTRO elemental bonus. The Main role for Jihnsi is Main DPS, focused on Resonance Skill Damage.
characters.jiyan: Jiyan is a character with AERO elemental bonus, Jiyan's main role is Main DPS, with focus on Heavy Attack DMG, since his liberation is considered as Heavy Attack.
characters.lingyang: Lingyang is a character with GLACIO elemental bonus, Lingyang is a Main DPS, with focus on Basic and Skill damage.
characters.mortefi: Mortefi is a character with FUSION elemental bonus, The highlight of Mortefi is that its Resonance Liberation affects all other characters after its use, for a few seconds Mortefi will attack along with the other characters even outside the field. Mortefi also increase Heavy Attack DMG in 38% after his Outro Skill: Rage Transposition.
characters.roverh: Rover (Havoc Ver.) is a character with HAVOC elemental bonus, Rover's is a Main DPS based on Forte Rotation.
characters.rover: Rover (Spectro Ver.) is a character with SPECTRO elemental bonus, Rover Spectro can be used as Main DPS, but Rover's highlight is the unique skill Stagnation, causing enemies in range to "freeze in time" in Outro: Instant.
characters.sanhua: Sanhua is a character with GLACIO elemental bonus. Her highlight is Basic Attack DMG Amplification in 38% to next character with Outro: Silversnow. Also can be used as Sub DPS with Heavy Attack Forte.
characters.taoqi: Taoqi is a character with HAVOC elemental bonus, Taoqi uses DEF as bonus in some skills. Taoqi can deal damage on Resonance Liberation focused on DEF status, but her highlight is the Resonance Skill Amplification in 38% to next character with Outro : Iron Will.
characters.shorekeeper: The Shorekeeper is a character with an elemental bonus SPECTRO, although she can cause some damage, her main focus is healing the team< /b>, standing out for its Resonance Liberation which, in addition to healing, can increase Critical Chance and Critical Damage by up to 12.5% ​​and 25 % respectively.
characters.verina: Verina is a character with an elemental bonus SPECTRO, her main focus is healing the team, Verina heal uses pure ATK and with Outro: Blossom will apply an All damage Amplification in 15%.
characters.xiangliyao: Xiangli Yao is a character with an elemental bonus ELECTRO, his main role is Main DPS focused on Resonance Liberation DMG.
characters.yangyang: Yangyang is a character with AERO elemental bonus, Yangyang's highlight are her Resonance Energy Regeneration Buff in 20 points with her Outro: Whispering Breeze.
characters.yinlin: Yinlin is a character with an elemental bonus ELECTRO, she can act as a Main DPS focused on Resonance Liberation, but her highlight is the role of Sub DPS/Team support with Electro DMG Amplification in 20% and Resonance Liberation DMG Amplification in 25% with her Outro: Strategist
characters.yuanwu: Yuanwu is a character with an elemental bonus ELECTRO, Yuanwu can do some damage with your Forte rotation, but his highlight is the Outro: Lightning Manipulation, causing Vibration Reduction (stun bar) and Interruption Boost.
characters.zhezhi: Zhezhi is a character with GLACIO elemental bonus, her damage is based on Basic Attacks but with emphasis on Glacio DMG Amplification in 20% and Resonance Skill DMG Amplification in 25% with Outro: Radiant Ruin

info: Due to the defense calculation not being exact, may vary by an average of 6.5% of the actual in-game value.
help1:
Raw Damage: It is your character's damage, ignoring any other type of mechanic (defense, resistance).
Use Raw Damage column as a basis to know if your character is better or worse, since it has no external variables.

Common Enemy DMG: Damage stipulated on common enemies, without resistance to their element
RES (resistent) Enemy DMG: Damage stipulated on enemies with resistance to your element.
In-game DMG is purely informative, for better metrics use the Raw Damage column.
delete: Are you sure? This action can't be undone
